strategy_reasoning: Uses the 'RPG Quest Log' metaphor to gamify the weekly updates, making technical changes feel like exciting in-game achievements. The cozy pixel art style lowers the barrier to entry for complex tech concepts.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art with chunky sprites, soft CRT scanlines, and a warm, nostalgic atmosphere similar to Stardew Valley.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot standing next to a rustic wooden RPG quest board in a lush meadow. The board features a clear pixel-font headline 'WEEKLY BUZZ'. The bee wears a tiny brown messenger bag and is pointing at the board with a happy expression. Soft lime green (#ecf874) grass and lavender gradient sky. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
images.description: Title card establishing the 'Weekly Update' as a recurring quest log or village notice.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing pixelated wizard glasses, casting a spell on a floating holographic map inside a cozy treehouse lab. This represents the new OpenClaw agents and search. Retro RPG text boxes float nearby reading 'SMART AGENTS' and 'API LEVEL UP'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) magical glow effects illuminate the room. Pastel book spines in background. Warm lighting, 8-bit aesthetic. Wholesome and smart.
images.description: Visualizing the 'Brain' updates (Agents, API, Search) as magical skill upgrades.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a tiny movie clapperboard and a vintage microphone on a small wooden stage. Background is a soft peach and lime green (#ecf874) gradient sunset. Floating pixel icons of film reels and musical notes surround the bee. A retro UI banner at the bottom reads 'VIDEO & AUDIO'. Chunky sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like A Short Hike. Creative and playful.
